          <title>
            <string language="en">Hop cones</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blütenzapfen des Hopfens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Houblon en cônes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cones de hop</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Coni di luppolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κώνοι λυκίσκου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Conos de salto</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the leaf and cone of a hop plant. The cone gives beer its bitter taste.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">beer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bitterness</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cones</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hop plant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Leaf</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt das Blatt und den Kegel 
eines Hopfenbetriebes. Der Kegel gibt Bier seinen bitteren 
Geschmack.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la feuille et le cône 
d'une usine d'houblon. Le cône donne à bière son goût amer.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a folha e o cone de uma 
planta do hop. O cone dá a cerveja seu gosto amargo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra il foglio ed il cono 
di una pianta del luppolo. Il cono dà a birra il relativo gusto
amaro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει το φύλλο και κώνο ενός 
φυτού λυκίσκου. Ο κώνος δίνει στην μπύρα την πικρή 
προτίμησή του.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la hoja y el cono de 
una planta del salto. El cono da a cerveza su gusto amargo.</string>
          </description>
